argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CREAM Currently has insufficent liquidity of base token to complete withdrawal."

documentation.text: before withdrawing from strat check there is enough liquidity in lending protocal

update strategist -> this is the address that receives fees + can complete rebalancing and update strategy thresholds
 strategist can also exit leveraged position i.e. withdraw all pooled LP and repay outstanding debt moving vault funds to reserves
keeper has ability to copmlete rebalancing functions & also deploy capital to strategy once reserves exceed some threshold
this is the withdrawl fee when user withdrawal results in removal of funds from strategy (i.e. withdrawal in excess of reserves)
function to deploy funds when reserves exceed reserve threshold (maximum is five percent)
function to remove funds from strategy when users withdraws funds in excess of reserves
rebalances RoboVault strat position to within target collateral range

deployStrat().notice: function to deploy funds when reserves exceed reserve threshold (maximum is five percent)

farmPid().notice: LP contract for base & short token

rebalanceCollateral().notice: rebalances RoboVault strat position to within target collateral range

setKeeper(address).notice: keeper has ability to copmlete rebalancing functions & also deploy capital to strategy once reserves exceed some threshold

setStrategist(address).notice: update strategist -> this is the address that receives fees + can complete rebalancing and update strategy thresholds strategist can also exit leveraged position i.e. withdraw all pooled LP and repay outstanding debt moving vault funds to reserves
